name: .CPL File Extension
summary: Learn about .CPL files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: For the most part, you should never need to directly open a CPL file. Instead, open Windows Control Panel and navigate to the feature you want to access.

However, double-clicking a CPL file will open the Control Panel feature that file contains. (Many CPL files are not named intuitively, so this is not the best method of accessing Control Panel features). Advanced users can also execute CPL files directly from the Windows command line.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
